changeSet.sql: -- Populate missing id_affiliate by matching filed_number with affiliate UPDATE public.affiliation_detail d SET id_affiliate = a.id_affiliate FROM public.affiliate a WHERE d.id_affiliate IS NULL AND a.filed_number = d.filed_number;

changeSet.author: andual

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM public.affiliation_detail d LEFT JOIN public.affiliate a ON a.id_affiliate = d.id_affiliate WHERE a.id_affiliate IS NULL OR d.id_affiliate IS NULL ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM public.affiliation_detail GROUP BY filed_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
